mapper.select: SELECT MTL_NO, MTL_CODE, MTL_NAME, MTL_STANDARD, MTL_UNIT, MTL_BASE_PRICE, MTL_PRC_TYPE, MTL_CLT_CODE, MTL_TYPE_CODE, MTL_USE_YN, MTL_COMMENTS, MTL_SUPP_CODE FROM MATERIALS WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MTL_NO DESC

SELECT MTL_NO, MTL_CODE, MTL_NAME, MTL_STANDARD, MTL_UNIT, MTL_BASE_PRICE, MTL_PRC_TYPE, MTL_CLT_CODE, MTL_TYPE_CODE, MTL_USE_YN, MTL_COMMENTS, MTL_SUPP_CODE FROM MATERIALS WHERE MTL_CODE = #{mtlCode} ORDER BY MTL_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATERIALS( MTL_NO, MTL_CODE, MTL_NAME, MTL_STANDARD, MTL_UNIT, MTL_BASE_PRICE, MTL_PRC_TYPE, MTL_CLT_CODE, MTL_TYPE_CODE, MTL_USE_YN, MTL_COMMENTS, MTL_SUPP_CODE ) VALUES ( #{mtlNo}, #{mtlCode}, #{mtlName}, #{mtlStandard}, #{mtlUnit}, #{mtlBasePrice}, #{mtlPrcType}, #{mtlCltCode}, #{mtlTypeCode}, #{mtlUseYn}, #{mtlComments} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MATERIALS SET MTL_NO = #{mtlNo}, MTL_CODE = #{mtlCode}, MTL_NAME = #{mtlName}, MTL_STANDARD = #{mtlStandard}, MTL_UNIT = #{mtlUnit}, MTL_BASE_PRICE = #{mtlBasePrice}, MTL_PRC_TYPE = #{mtlPrcType}, MTL_CLT_CODE = #{mtlCltCode}, MTL_TYPE_CODE = #{mtlTypeCode}, MTL_USE_YN = #{mtlUseYn}, MTL_COMMENTS = #{mtlComments} WHERE MTL_CODE = #{mtlCode}
